article_title: A Simple Way To Save Billions Of Dollars On Emergency Care

article_metadata.description: “If you insure them, they will come.” Those words might as well be the mantra of hospitals across the country, because they can expect an onslaught of customers thanks to the expansion of health insurance under Obamacare. A recent study published in Science showed increased emergency room use among people in [...]
